name: MUTATION PHASE
description: MUTATION PHASE is a horror-shooter with a first-person view, which narrates the consequences of experiments with sound waves. You have to survive among hordes of mutants and get out of the danger zone.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Pentium Dual Core 2.4 GHz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics 610 or Nvidia GeForce GT 440 GDDR5 (1GB), or equivalent Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Not tested in weaker configurations.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Pentium Dual Core 3.5 GHz  or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 740 GDDR5 (2GB) or equivalent Storage: 3 GB available space
